itunes:title: Episode 539 - Special Guest MTV's "The Challenge" Host TJ Lavin
title: Episode 539 - Special Guest MTV's "The Challenge" Host TJ Lavin
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with BMX legend TJ Lavin to discuss his career, what it's like winning the gold medal at the X Games, how he's still alive after 50 concussions, hosting MTV's Road Rules for the last 26 seasons, and the death of o...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with BMX legend TJ Lavin to discuss his career, what it's like winning the gold medal at the X Games, how he's still alive after 50 concussions, hosting MTV's Road Rules for the last 26 seasons, and the death of one of his best friends Dave Mirra.
